# Tools

> Standard library tools.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var tools = require( '@stdlib/tools' );
```

#### tools

Standard library tools.

```javascript
var t = tools;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
